plot: During the zombie apocalypse of Singapore, some survivors holed themselves up in an apartment and made a video of their time there. The video was found 28 days later.
title: Survivors: A Hsien of the Dead Short
plot_es: During the zombie apocalypse of Singapore, some survivors holed themselves up in an apartment and made a video of their time there. The video was found 28 days later.
original_name: Survivors: A Hsien of the Dead Short
plot_en: During the zombie apocalypse of Singapore, some survivors holed themselves up in an apartment and made a video of their time there. The video was found 28 days later.
